text: Beverley Ann Mitchell (born January 22, 1981) is an American actress and country music singer. She is perhaps best known for her role as Lucy Camden- Kinkirk on the television series 7th Heaven. ==Movies and television== Year Title Role Notes 1990 Big Brother Jake Cassie TV Series 1990 Children of the Bride Jersey TV movie 1991 Baby of the Bride Jersey TV movie 1992 Sinatra Little Nancy at 7-9 TV movie 1993 Mother of the Bride Jersey TV movie 1993 Phenom Clara TV Series (1993-1994) 1994 Killing Obsession Annie 1995 White Dwarf XuXu, Older Twin TV movie 1996 -2007 7th Heaven Lucy Camden TV series 1996 The Crow: City of Angels Grace 2000 Girl Band Suzanne TV movie 2003 Right on Track Erica Enders TV movie 2003 Mean People Suck Kate's Sister 2005 Saw II Laura 2005 I Remember Molly 2007 Post Mortem Mackenzie Greer 2010 The Secret Life of the American Teenager Kaitlin O'Malley TV series Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Beverley Mitchell
